name: Fire Initiate
core: An early but genuine flame suggests the matter is ready for disciplined beginnings rather than spectacle.
shadow: Enthusiasm becomes waste when the first spark is treated as finished mastery.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward beginning plainly and with intent.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests preparing the fuel before the effort is expanded.

name: Fire Vanguard
core: Forward pressure suggests the first duty is to establish momentum without losing command of pace.
shadow: Leadership becomes provocation when movement is prized over direction.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates an assertive step can be taken now.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests narrowing the line of advance before committing fully.

name: Fire Conduit
core: Channelled force suggests the work can move cleanly when energy is given form and sequence.
shadow: Power distorts when the channel confuses transmission with ownership.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward directing effort with precision.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reducing excess so the current remains clear.

name: Fire Sovereign
core: Authority grounded in will suggests decisive stewardship over the matter is available.
shadow: Authority becomes tyranny when command is used to feed appetite rather than serve the whole.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward clear command and responsible action.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests confirming legitimacy before enforcing the decision.

name: Ice Initiate
core: A restrained opening suggests the matter benefits from composure, exactness, and measured entry.
shadow: Reserve becomes inhibition when the first step is postponed beyond reason.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward a precise first move made without haste.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests settling the field before advancing.

name: Ice Vanguard
core: Strategic pressure suggests that position and timing matter more than raw force.
shadow: Control becomes brittleness when no allowance is made for living complexity.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates disciplined advance can succeed if the line stays clean.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports holding formation until conditions clarify.

name: Ice Conduit
core: Refined transmission suggests the work improves when sharpened, filtered, and made exact.
shadow: Precision becomes sterility when all warmth is edited out of the exchange.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward exact communication and clean execution.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reducing noise before anything important is sent onward.

name: Ice Sovereign
core: Authority through restraint suggests order can be maintained without noise or display.
shadow: Order becomes cold domination when form is valued above living consequence.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward firm governance tempered by clarity.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports preserving structure and narrowing the field of action.

name: Wind Initiate
core: A light beginning suggests flexibility and responsiveness should guide the first movement.
shadow: Adaptability becomes drift when no course is held long enough to matter.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward testing the path with a quick but thoughtful step.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests listening to the shifts before committing further.

name: Wind Vanguard
core: Movement shaped by awareness suggests progress comes through agility rather than collision.
shadow: Speed becomes evasion when direction is constantly traded for motion.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates momentum can be used intelligently now.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests checking the currents before advancing again.

name: Wind Conduit
core: Circulation suggests information and effort should move freely enough to keep the pattern alive.
shadow: Circulation becomes chatter when motion replaces substance.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward timely exchange and well-paced coordination.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests trimming excess movement until the signal is clear.

name: Wind Sovereign
core: Command through adaptability suggests broad oversight and light-handed direction are favored.
shadow: Adaptable rule becomes inconsistency when nothing stable anchors the command.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward guiding the field by movement and timing.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests establishing a steadier center before widening influence.

name: Water Initiate
core: A tentative current suggests receptivity, listening, and adaptation are part of the proper opening.
shadow: Sensitivity becomes drift when every pressure alters the course.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates responsiveness can still support timely action.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests settling before choosing a channel.

name: Water Vanguard
core: Adaptable movement suggests progress comes through shaping around resistance rather than striking it directly.
shadow: Adaptation becomes evasiveness when no form is held long enough to matter.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward flexible motion with a clear destination.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests observing the terrain before pressing ahead.

name: Water Conduit
core: Transmission through feeling suggests understanding grows when the current is allowed to carry nuance rather than force.
shadow: Sensitivity becomes leakage when every boundary is softened at once.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward responsive exchange guided by care.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests containing the current before sending it outward.

name: Water Sovereign
core: Authority through depth suggests influence is strongest when it draws others into accord rather than forcing compliance.
shadow: Depth becomes manipulation when emotional knowledge is used to steer without consent.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward guiding through attunement and patient command.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests deepening understanding before exercising influence.

name: Earth Initiate
core: A grounded beginning suggests the matter should be built from what can bear weight over time.
shadow: Groundedness becomes inertia when caution is mistaken for substance.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward taking one practical step that can hold.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests checking the footing before adding load.

name: Earth Vanguard
core: Steady pressure suggests endurance and placement matter more than speed.
shadow: Steadiness becomes stubbornness when the line is held for its own sake.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward deliberate progress supported by firm structure.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reinforcing the base before moving further.

name: Earth Conduit
core: A solid channel suggests effort should be routed through dependable forms rather than improvised ones.
shadow: Dependability becomes blockage when the channel can no longer adapt to real conditions.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward using sound systems to support forward work.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests repairing the conduit before trusting it with more weight.

name: Earth Sovereign
core: Established authority suggests durable order can be maintained through patience, structure, and proven form.
shadow: Durability becomes oppression when permanence is used to silence change.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward ruling through reliability and material clarity.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests holding the foundation while pressures settle.

name: Lightning Initiate
core: A charged opening suggests recognition arrives quickly and should be met with alert discipline.
shadow: Quickness becomes agitation when every impulse is treated as a command.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward immediate awareness and nimble response.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests grounding the current before acting on it.

name: Lightning Vanguard
core: Swift pressure suggests the field can change faster than habit expects, favoring readiness over routine.
shadow: Readiness becomes volatility when reaction outruns discernment.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward decisive response with a clear line of intent.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests absorbing the charge before directing it.

name: Lightning Conduit
core: High-voltage transmission suggests insight and force are strongest when precisely routed.
shadow: Transmission becomes overload when too much force is carried through an unready path.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward directing the current into useful form.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests insulating the line before amplifying it.

name: Lightning Sovereign
core: Command through forceful clarity suggests the decision point has arrived and should not be disguised.
shadow: Clarity becomes coercion when authority values obedience over understanding.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward explicit command and timely judgment.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests containing the charge until the right moment to release it.
